author: tatuvlakia
title: Short, sweet polybag kit
review:
A nice polybag, in that is complements bigger sets adding one more Car.

It is not a mini scale vehicle like other Star Wars polybags, but a full size (for Lego) Cars character.

Building experience is as good as the limited piece count could allow, with some interesting snot.

Parts-wise, it is a good small set, with the mentioned window, a cool large flame piece and a good selection of assorted red and light bley, with a few yellow and blue. No stickers, but two well printed pieces, the eyes and the front grille.
Not much, but ok for a polybag.

Play value is ok for a Car, with the addition of the movable welding mask and torch as highlights.

The finished model is ok, though it has a couple of minus points.

First, the "welding mask" piece (a clever use of a 3x2 window piece with a somewhat rare clear blue glass) is not centered, particularly noticeable when in front of the Grem´s eyes.

Second, and most importantly, the Grem´s color should have been orange which is much more movie accurate (it should be a burned orange color). This is solved in the Grem which is included in the Oil Rig Escape Set. This polybag edition uses red bricks instead.
